name: Extraction - Ludum Dare 39
description:
Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 39

Ludum Dare Entry Page

Defend yourself in the wreckage of your shuttle while awaiting extraction. Turn the surrounding turrets on and off to fend off the enemies, but keep a close eye on your power usage.

Instructions

  •  Click the surrounding turrets to move to them and toggle them on/off
  • When a turret is damaged, a wrench icon will appear above it. Click on the turret and wait beside it to fill the meter
  • WASD/Arrows can be used to move the camera around
  • Collect the pink crystals dropped by enemies to regain energy
  • Turning off all turrets will recharge energy
  • The game ends if any of the following happens:
    •  You're caught in an explosion
    • Your shuttle is destroyed,
    • You are extracted from the crash zone successfully
